resources.string: Monthly revenue increased by 15% compared to last month. Total revenue: $1.2M. Key drivers: Product sales (60%), Services (25%), Subscriptions (15%).
Active users: 45,678. New signups: 2,345 this month. User retention rate: 78%. Top regions: North America (45%), Europe (30%), Asia (25%).
Conversion rate: 3.4%. Improved by 0.5% from last quarter. Funnel analysis: Visitors (100K) → Leads (8.5K) → Customers (3.4K).
Quarterly growth: 12%. Year-over-year growth: 28%. Market share: 15%. Projected next quarter growth: 10-14%.
Select a metric to view detailed information
